item.title: 8.2 Live stream
item.description: Live stream # After adding the camera, if you want to watch the live video with the Map, do the following: Click on Camera > Live stream. 1. Details # 1: Select the vehicle with the camera configured. Click on a certain 1 channel. Choose one of the following modes: Play : View only the selected channel. Stop : Only stops the currently selected channel.

item.title: 8.3 Playback video
item.description: Playback video # To watch the video again, do the following: Click on Camera > Playback video. 1. Search # Step 1: Search by the following criteria: Device: Select the number plate of that device. Camera: Select the camera channel you want to watch specifically. Date: Select the date you want to review the camera video. From … To: Choose a time interval to review the video.
